name: Follow Your Heart VR
description:
Overview

Follow Your Heart is a VR co-op game for the HTC Vive with the goal being to complete the maze and find the heart. One user is wearing the headset and is in a invisible maze in total darkness and all they can see is a glowing heart. The other is on the PC with an overview of the maze and where the VR User is. The two players must communicate to get to the end. If the VR user touches the wall, he respawns back to the beginning! This project was developed for the Brackeys Game Jam #2.

Features

  • VR Puzzle
  • Co-Op
  • Communication

Controls

PC User:

  • R - Restart
  • Escape - Quit

VR User:

  • Trigger - Move in direction you are looking
